Articles.Content:
So Have just installed a few mods and I get crash when game starts after the loading.

The mods are. b9 aerospace, Visual enhancements, Redux Flightengineer.

The error and crash reports can be found here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/2k0zy5w0iihg054/2014-09-15_072006.rar?dl=0

Edited September 15, 2014 by Grubse

Welcome to the forums!

Please follow the instructions in the READ FIRST sticky so we can help!

So Have just installed a few mods and I get crash when game starts after the loading.

The mods are. b9 aerospace, Visual enhancements, Redux Flightengineer.

The error and crash reports can be found here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/2k0zy5w0iihg054/2014-09-15_072006.rar?dl=0

Looks like you launch the 32bit and hit the memory limit.

EDIT- have you try'ed to pull it out of steam ?

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe
And putting it right in C:\ so it's c:\Kerbal Space Program

EDIT- Not sure about windows but Linux has a Laucher x86 and Laugher x86_64 if windows is the same try the x86_64

Edited September 15, 2014 by Mecripp2
